description: This minion's master has 5% more stats for each {CONDNAME_MINION_UNSTABLEHORROR} it has. After this minion's master {ACTION_defends} or {ACTION_provokes}, it deals damage to all enemies equal to 10% of its master's highest stat for each stack of {CONDNAME_MINION_UNSTABLEHORROR} it has. Maximum of 9 stacks.
name: Unstable Horror
